## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineschedstrategy">MachineSchedStrategy</a> implementation for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64">AArch64</a> post RA scheduling.

## Protected Member Functions

### tryCandidate() {#a13b69f0a0d56eb5e0802e40b938136a6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AArch64PostRASchedStrategy::tryCandidate (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/genericschedulerbase/schedcandidate">SchedCandidate</a> &amp; Cand, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/genericschedulerbase/schedcandidate">SchedCandidate</a> &amp; TryCand)</>}
  labels = {["protected", "virtual"]}>
Apply a set of heuristics to a new candidate for PostRA scheduling.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Cand">provides the policy and current best candidate.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="TryCand">refers to the next <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> candidate, otherwise uninitialized.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
<code>true</code> if TryCand is better than Cand (Reason is NOT NoCand)
</SectionUser>
